name: Unplaceable Revised
description:
This game was produce for the Epic MegaJam 2021,  but because the deadline i posted with several problems, in this version i fixed several bugs  and incomplete things that there were, i also add gamepad input.

So, the game is a "mail delivery warehouse simulator " ( ???) was very inspired on overcooked gameplay and some experience from tetris, here you take on the role of a worker in a warehouse that gets super busy as time goes on and you advance through the levels.

I hope you enjoy!
